meanings.definition: Move irregularly with a splashing sound.
meanings.sent1: The water sloshes in the bucket.
meanings.sent2: She sloshes the paint on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy sloshes water everywhere during bath time.
meanings.sent4: The storm sloshes the waves against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The milk sloshes in the jug as she carries it carefully.

meanings.definition: Cause liquid to move about in a slopping manner.
meanings.sent1: He sloshes the soup into the bowl.
meanings.sent2: The kids slosh the water around in the pool.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter sloshes the drinks on the customers.
meanings.sent4: The wind sloshes the leaves around in the yard.
meanings.sent5: The chef sloshes the sauce onto the plate with a flourish.
